titleStmt.title: An act concerning mortgages, extents, &c. upon delinquents estates
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Husband and Iohn Field, Printers to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: No imprint; imprint from other acts which are continuosly paged with this act.
On 8I1: the last word of first line of text: 'Or-'; first word of line below initial: 'Estate'; the last word of last full line of text: 'Ex-'.
Also issued as part of a through-paged folio set with a table for the entire set added.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
